summary: My first follower that I made.I hope you guys like the story and character :)
descriptionHtml:
[color=#fce5cd][font=Comic Sans MS][u][center][size=6]
[/size][/center][center][size=6][b]ELISE
[/b][/size][/center][/u][/font][/color]
[size=5][center]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#fce5cd][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/images/571935/?go=force_view]MOD COVER - ELISE[/url] by[/color][color=#00ffff] [/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8267681/?]PTC001[/url] [color=#fce5cd]check it out ! :)

[img]http://s30.postimg.org/rxke1xvxd/light_heavy.png[/img]

[/color][/font][/center][/size][center][color=#fce5cd][size=6][b][u]
[font=Comic Sans MS]INFO AND STATS[/font][/u][/b][/size][/color][color=#00ffff]
[/color][/center]
[center][font=Comic Sans MS]-Im gonna remind you guys that this is my first follower mod :)
-Elise can be found in Whiterun (Warmaidens)                          
-It took me time to write story try to read it xD                     

[b]     RACE- [/b][b]Nord       [/b][b] [/b]   
[/font][b][font=Comic Sans MS]SKILL[/font]- 1 Handed[/b][/center][font=Comic Sans MS][center][b]             LEVEL- Same as player      [/b]
[b]                       WEAPON- Alacrity (onehanded sword)[/b]
[b]                                                                  SPELL- Grand Healing(when elise reaches 1/3 of her healt she uses this spell)[/b]
[b]                                                  ARMOR- Companion's set(Heavy Armor) or Light(Demon Hunter)[/b]
[b]                 LOCATION-Whiterun (Warmane)
[/b][b]                                                           PERKS-Juggernaut,[i]Cushioned,[/i][i]Well Fitted,Lightfoot.....(and many more)[/i][/b][/center]
[/font]
[color=#fce5cd][center]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=6][u][b]BACKGROUND STORY[/b][/u][/size][/font][/center][/color]
[b][size=6][u]
[/u][/size][font=Comic Sans MS][i]As a young girl Elise was found by Kodlak-Whitemane on his trip over Skyrim.First when he saw her,she was just a little 
girl that was desperate,lost and she was barely standing.Kodlak with few others took her to the Jorrvaskr and raised her 
as his own in the spirit of companions, the guild simillar to fighters guild.While she was growing up she has shown a great potential,
she has become expert in healing and one handed combat.The sword she always wanted to use was a Greatsword,she first saw it in the hands of Farkas,the muscled man, but only thing that she could lift was a sword that was called "Alacrity",made out of the finest steel from the fallen stars.
The sword was given to her as a gift from the old khajit trader named Bill,
Her only friend that was telling her stories about his land thats so far away.
She never really told anyone about her familly not even to her only friend,But one thing was sure,Her familly was slaughtered so as the various other people in the little town named Helgen in the southern mountains of skyrim.Elise has never stopped looking for her parents,but she was so little back then that she couldn't remember the names of her parents or her older sister, only thing that she could remember is that they
were farmers and that both of them had a white hair.After few years of searching,she ended up at the place where it all started,the Helgen.
At the first look helgen was completely ruined,on the both sides of road that led towards the town gates there were crucified and hanged man,woman and children..
What she saw there didnt stop her from entering the gates..However inside the town there was even worse scenario, there were savages everywhere,She tought (this place cannot be called home anymore and my parents are probably long since gone)so she turned around towards the sun and left the Helgen behind her forever.
By the time she got back home,Kodlak was close to death and his last wish was to cure his lycantrophy so he can enter Sovengarde,Otherwise he would enter the hunting 
grounds of the daedra princ,so Elise had to find him a cure.When she brought him a cure,the other companions said that he was long since dead and that the dragonborn
has cured him.She was dissapointed but in the same time she felt relief.. By the time she has earned a new friend Ulfberth War-Bear
that gave her a place to stay.
[/i][/font]

[/b][quote][b][size=3][color=#ff0000]SPOILER ABOUT HER PARENTS!!!! (Only for those who didnt get it from story)[/color][/size][/b][/quote]Her parents seem to be Jofthor and Boti while her sister's name is Fastred (Jofthor is not letting Fastred to see the world because long time ago her sister did it too and she is gone) According to my story :)) 
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=6][u]
